thread.section_title: Hotel WO - Wilson Opera - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: 5 star service
thread.title_full: 5 star service - Review of Hotel WO - Wilson Opera, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Daniel G
title: 5 star service
text: Our first time in Paris and we couldn't have chosen a better hotel to stay at. Not only is the location incredible, but the staff was amazing! They helped us out from anything from recommendations to eat, to what places to visit, to how to get around. By far one of the best hotels we have ever stayed at. Will certainly be coming back to stay here!
